name: @danmarshall/privatetestmaker
description: Maker.js is a JavaScript library for creating programmable 2D vector drawings that can be exported to SVG or DXF file formats for CNC and laser cutter machines.

scripts.precompile-typescript: ls src/core/*.ts > build.txt && ls src/models/*.ts >> build.txt && ls src/tools/*.ts >> build.txt
scripts.target-node-platform: cd target && mv makerjs.js node.maker.js && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run compile-typescript && npm run target-node-platform && npm run target-browser-platform

author: Dan Marshall / Microsoft Corporation
